bill.title: Free port warehouse law; clarify that manufacturers are eligible for ad valorem tax exemption.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 27-31-51 And 27-31-53, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify That Manufacturers Of Personal Property That Maintain Separate Facilities For The Temporary Storage And Handling Of Such Personal Property Pending Transit To A Final Destination Outside The State Of Mississippi Are Eligible For Licensing As A "free Port Warehouse" And That Personal Property That Is Manufactured In The State Of Mississippi And Stored In Such Facilities Pending Transit To A Final Destination Outside The State Of Mississippi, Is Eligible For Exemption From Ad Valorem Taxation; And For Related Purposes.
